main event: Twenty-five Lausanne School students and Mrs. Don Atlan witnessed an unusual flying object in Lausanne, Switzerland on February 14th.
interesting points: The object had red and green lights on its underside and large windows., It was observed hovering with no sound, moving slowly and then returning after leaving., The event was witnessed by multiple students and a teacher., The description included revolving white lights on the bottom half of the object., The sighting lasted from 8:30 to 9:00.
